ctf_scenarios.name: Capture the Flag Basic
ctf_scenarios.description: A basic CTF scenario involving common web vulnerabilities such as SQLi and XSS.

objectives.description: Exploit SQL injection vulnerability to access the database.
Perform cross-site scripting (XSS) to execute a payload in the context of the web application.

ctf_scenarios.name: Advanced Persistent Threat Simulation
ctf_scenarios.description: Simulate an APT attack on a network to test incident response and threat hunting capabilities.

objectives.description: Gain initial access through a phishing campaign.
objectives.success_criteria: Initial foothold in the network is established.
Stable C2 channel is set up.
Access to high-value systems is obtained.

objectives.description: Exfiltrate sensitive data without being detected.
objectives.success_criteria: Sensitive data is exfiltrated and confirmed.

ctf_scenarios.success_indicator: Data is exfiltrated and C2 remains undetected.

ctf_scenarios.name: Critical Infrastructure Protection
ctf_scenarios.description: Test the resilience of critical infrastructure against cyber-physical attacks.

objectives.success_criteria: Access to SCADA network is achieved.

objectives.description: Manipulate control system to cause a service disruption.

ctf_scenarios.success_indicator: Service disruption is caused without detection.
